Class CheckInput

java.lang.Object
src.core.CheckInput
public class CheckInput extends Object
Ð¡lass, consisting of only static methods, using to check if the input is appropriate to use in the programme, and to print a message if it doesn't

      public static boolean checkFirstLine​(String[] input)

      input - array, which first element is command name and the second is null or argumnet
      Returns:
      if input is name of command with optional argument
